group_1.narration: The days went by...
How long has it been@since I reunited with Hanna?
A few months? A year?
I can't tell if my perception of time has changed@from when I was human...
But lately, I've had the feeling...that Hanna seems@to have grown tame and dim.
When we were first reunited,@I thought she was broken in a good way,@perfect for who I've become now...
As I expected, Hanna was still@her same old self:
A kind and serious girl, whose bravado@betrayed how cute she was...
And that was a bad thing.
To ruin everything means@to lose everything, right?
It means we're going to destroy it all.
But the way Hanna is now, the only thing@she can do is make little messes...@Even she wouldn't be happy with just that.
So I'll show her the way.

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if I can show that to Hanna, too.
Show her how ugly and sad the world is...
I want to share those visions with her...
Hey, Hanna... This is what I've been seeing@for a long time now.
I'm sure...I'm seeing what a Witch sees.
...I really must be a Witch now...@All that's left is to lose my persona, and...
Hanna...I don't think I can do this anymore.
I can't control my hatred, I want to destroy@everything...!
So...
*Gasp* [wait:0.8][chara:104400:lipSynch_1]You were awake?
Erm, I was just...

group_1.textRight: It's all good. I get it.
Sometimes I wonder what I'm doin' myself.
Like, no matter what we do, there ain't@any point in it...

group_1.textLeft: So that means...

group_1.textRight: Nuh-uh! Don't try making me do anything@funny.
I've made up my mind.@I ain't changin' a thing.

group_1.textLeft: What...?
Why?!
You said we were going to ruin everything,@right?!
And yet nothing's actually changed...!
But you can fix that, right?
You're going to destroy the whole world,@aren't you?
Right? You're amazing, Hanna, so that@means you can do it. Isn't that right?
Just say yes!

group_1.textRight: ...What are you so worked up for, Sena?

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: You've always been like this... Whenever you get worried, you start spirallin' outta control.
...You're worried, aren't you?@You're afraid of becomin' a Witch.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* You misunderstand, Hanna.
I already AM a Witch.@I've just been given a grace period.
I'm flooded with hatred, resentment,@and all sorts of negative feelings.
Sometimes, I feel like I'm about to forget@who I am.
...Eventually, I'll forget myself altogether.@I just know it.
And then...I'll be gone.

group_1.textRight: I've said it before and I'll say it again!@You're not going anywhere, Sena.

group_1.textLeft: You don't understand!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, there's a lot of things I don't understand,@but I know I understand you, Sena.

group_1.textLeft: No you don't!
You have no idea what it's like for me now@that I'm in this form!
Ah...

group_1.narration: Hanna and I didn't say a word@to each other after that.
It was our first fight...@Well, no...it was just me who was yelling...@Hanna didn't do anything wrong.
I couldn't stop thinking of how embarrassed I was...@And how badly I wanted to disappear...
And so that's just what I did.
But I could still see things clearly around me...@Yes, I could do at least that...
Even though I've disappeared,@Hanna isn't freaking out at all...
Could I be putting a burden on her...?@She might be better off without me...
Huh...?
She's in pain...?@Why? What's going on?
Back then...just before I became a Witch...@I was in serious pain...
But...why am I remembering that now...?
She's just feeling a little pain...@She can't be becoming a Witch...@She can't be...!

group_1.textLeft: Hanna...!
Th-this...

group_1.narration: I nearly collapsed when I saw@Hanna's Soul Gem in her hand.
It was so corrupt that it was almost black.
